text:
Hmm. I'm not a huge fan. I'd prefer something like PATHSolver.jl.

That being said, it's your package, so if you really want to keep this name, ping me in 3 days and I can merge it.

But I would recommend at least considering something more descriptive, like PATHSolver.jl.

elements.text: Hmm. I'm not a huge fan. I'd prefer something like PATHSolver.jl.
That being said, it's your package, so if you really want to keep this name, ping me in 3 days and I can merge it.
But I would recommend at least considering something more descriptive, like PATHSolver.jl.

text: It sounds like there is already <https://github.com/chkwon/PATHSolver.jl>. Although is it planned to maintain both? Or could the new be v2 of the old?

elements.text: It sounds like there is already
. Although is it planned to maintain both? Or could the new be v2 of the old?

text: I guess we could consider replacing PATHSolver with PATH. Are there precedents for entirely replacing a released package with another to take over the name? I guess if we released it as a v1.0, there wouldn't be an issue...

elements.text: I guess we could consider replacing PATHSolver with PATH. Are there precedents for entirely replacing a released package with another to take over the name? I guess if we released it as a v1.0, there wouldn't be an issue...

text: That's exactly what happened with PackageCompiler.jl and PackageCompilerX.jl. Basically, Kristoffer made a PR to PackageCompiler.jl that replaced all the contents of PackageCompiler.jl with the contents of PackageCompilerX.jl. Then we merged that PR and released PackageCompiler.jl version 1.0.0.

elements.text: That's exactly what happened with PackageCompiler.jl and PackageCompilerX.jl. Basically, Kristoffer made a PR to PackageCompiler.jl that replaced all the contents of PackageCompiler.jl with the contents of PackageCompilerX.jl. Then we merged that PR and released PackageCompiler.jl version 1.0.0.

text: Ah okay. I'll talk to chkwon and see what his plans are, and I'll close the PR to general for now.

elements.text: Ah okay. I'll talk to chkwon and see what his plans are, and I'll close the PR to general for now.

text: Thanks for the suggestion on the v2. v1.0 of PATHSolver has been registered with a complete replacement of the code: <https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/28675>. The only thing I can't figure out how to do is close the original PR to general: <https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/28646>
